Detailed Description

QSPI driver.

============================================================================

Function Documentation

int32_t QSPI_close ( QSPI_Handle  handle)

Function to close a QSPI driver instance specified by the QSPI handle.

Precondition
QSPI_open() has been called.
Parameters
handleA QSPI_Handle returned from QSPI_open()
Returns
0 upon success. Error code if an error occurs.
See also
QSPI_open()
QSPI_Handle QSPI_open ( QSPI_Params *  params,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Function to initialize a given QSPI peripheral.

Precondition
QSPI_init() has been called
Parameters
[in]paramsQSPI params for creating QSPI driver instance. This structure can be pre-populated with default values using QSPI_Params_init() API.
[out]errCodeError Code populated by QSPI driver in case of error.
Returns
A QSPI_Handle upon success. NULL if an error occurs.
See also
QSPI_init()
QSPI_close()
